title: Luxury Beachside Group Villa near Lombok
description: Experience the ultimate island escape at the oceanfront Villa Selalu Gili Gede. This private hilltop villa, on a small island just 200m from the coast of Lombok, offers true tranquility and relaxation. Your stay includes exclusive use of the villa for four people using two bedrooms, 24-hour butler service, daily Ã  la carte breakfast, a 60-minute massage, a three-course dinner and a nightly cocktail each. After exploring the expansive property, relax by the 18-metre infinity pool or walk down to the white-sand beach just a few minutes away and discover this patch of paradise. Upgrades for up to eight available.
offer_address: Gili Gede, Central Sekotong, West Lombok Regency, West Nusa Tenggara 83365, Indonesia
